title: Eco Mode
description:
Smart Data Models Program adaptation of the original IoTData data Models. This Resource specifies the supported and currently active Eco Mode of a Device
The Resource is a deriviative of the Mode Resource (oic.r.mode) with a restriction that the population of supportedmodes and modes Properties is restricted to the set of values:
"disabled","enabled","notsupported".
The adminforced Property indicates that the value has been set by another party (e.g. via some offboard Smart Energy interaction)

modes.description: Property. The array of the currently active mode(s).

supportedModes.description: Property. The array of possible modes the device supports.

adminforced.description: Property. The indicator that the current mode of operation has been forced by admin action.

n.description: Property. Friendly name of the Resource

if.description: Property. The OCF Interface set supported by this Resource.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be ecomode
